attributes.name: approvedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

attributes.name: approvedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

attributes.name: batchId
attributes.description: System-generated ID for batch.

attributes.name: billingAddressAdditionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the billing address.

attributes.name: billingAddressAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: billingAddressBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building billing address of the supplier.

attributes.name: billingAddressCity
attributes.description: The physical city in the billing address of the supplier.

attributes.name: billingAddressCountry
attributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

attributes.name: billingAddressNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number of the billing address of the supplier.

attributes.name: billingAddressPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the building where the billing address is located.

attributes.name: billingAddressRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the supplier is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: billingAddressStreetName
attributes.description: The street listed in the billing address of the supplier.

attributes.name: branchStoreNumber
attributes.description: Branch or store number, additional segregation of customer/supplier, used if not included as part of the customer/supplier ID.

attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: distributionPercentageForMultipleAccountAssignment
attributes.description: One PO will have multiple account assignment or account distribution, hence, PO line item should capture the % of allocation to each account.

attributes.name: glPostingDate
attributes.description: The date of posting to GL.

attributes.name: lastModifiedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

attributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

attributes.name: lineAccountId
attributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL-revenue-account. Can be including sub-account ID. It can contain many different levels to identify the account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

attributes.name: lineApprovedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

attributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

attributes.name: lineCreditNoteReason
attributes.description: Credit note reason or rationale.

attributes.name: lineCreditNoteReference
attributes.description: Credit note reference (where applicable) to original invoice.

attributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
attributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

attributes.name: lineDeliveryDate
attributes.description: The date of the delivery.

attributes.name: lineDescription
attributes.description: Description of purchase order line item.

attributes.name: lineFromDate
attributes.description: Start date of the deliveries.

attributes.name: lineGoodsServicesId
attributes.description: Indicator showing if goods or service.

attributes.name: lineLineNumber
attributes.description: Line item number of the purchase order.

attributes.name: lineMovementReference
attributes.description: Unique reference to the movement.

attributes.name: lineOrderLineAmount
attributes.description: Amount value of the line item in the order.

attributes.name: lineOrderLineAmountCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: lineOrderLineAmountExchangeRate
attributes.description: Exchange rate applying to the value of the line item in the order.

attributes.name: lineOrderLineLocalAmount
attributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

attributes.name: lineOrderUOM
attributes.description: Purchase order line base unit of measure.

attributes.name: linePIDate
attributes.description: The date of Purchase Invoice associated with line item.

attributes.name: lineProductCode
attributes.description: Code identifying the product within the line.

attributes.name: lineProductDescription
attributes.description: Product (plain language) description to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the product.

attributes.name: linePurchaseOrderProductGroup01
attributes.description: Product descriptor #1, e.g. tyres or accessories.

attributes.name: linePurchaseOrderProductGroup02
attributes.description: Product descriptor #2, e.g. brand.

attributes.name: lineQuantity
attributes.description: Quantity of goods and services supplied.

attributes.name: lineShipFromAdditionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the shipping address.

attributes.name: lineShipFromAddress
attributes.description: The identifier for address from where the order is shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipFromAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: lineShipFromBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: lineShipFromCity
attributes.description: The physical city in the shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: lineShipFromCountry
attributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

attributes.name: lineShipFromDeliveryDate
attributes.description: The date goods are dispatched.

attributes.name: lineShipFromDeliveryId
attributes.description: Identification of the delivery.

attributes.name: lineShipFromLocationId
attributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress or stock-in-transit.

attributes.name: lineShipFromNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number of the shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: lineShipFromPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the shipping address.

attributes.name: lineShipFromRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the supplier is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: lineShipFromStreetName
attributes.description: The street from which goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipFromUCR
attributes.description: Unique consignment reference number.

attributes.name: lineShipFromWarehouseId
attributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress or stock-in-transit.

attributes.name: lineShipToAdditionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the address to which items will be shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipToAddress
attributes.description: The identifier for address to where the order is shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipToAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: lineShipToBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building shipping to address.

attributes.name: lineShipToCity
attributes.description: The physical city to which the goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipToCountry
attributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

attributes.name: lineShipToDeliveryDate
attributes.description: The date goods are delivered.

attributes.name: lineShipToDeliveryId
attributes.description: Identification of the delivery.

attributes.name: lineShipToLocationId
attributes.description: Location of goods in warehouse.

attributes.name: lineShipToNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number to which the goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: lineShipToPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the shipping to address.

attributes.name: lineShipToRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the supplier is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: lineShipToStreetName
attributes.description: The street to which goods will be delivered.

attributes.name: lineShipToUCR
attributes.description: Unique consignment reference number.

attributes.name: lineShipToWarehouseId
attributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress or stock-in-transit.

attributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmount
attributes.description: Costs of shipping in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency.

attributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountExchangeRate
attributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

attributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountLocal
attributes.description: Amount of the shipping costs in the local (foreign) currency.

attributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountLocalCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: lineSubsequentPI
attributes.description: ID of Purchase Invoice associated with line item subsequent to initial recognition.

attributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
attributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

attributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
attributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
attributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount or a quantity, e.g. litres.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
attributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
attributes.description: Tax code for lookup in tables.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
attributes.description: The identification of the period of the declaration/return in which the tax amount is reported to the revenue body.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
attributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
attributes.description: Tax percentage.

attributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxType
attributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

attributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
attributes.description: Tax point date where recorded or, if not recorded, then the invoice date.

attributes.name: lineToDate
attributes.description: End date of the purchase order line item.

attributes.name: lineUOMToUOMBaseConversionFactor
attributes.description: Conversion factor of the Invoice UOM to UOM Base. Only needed when is reported and is different from the UOM Base.

attributes.name: lineUnitPrice
attributes.description: Unit price for the unit/group of units per UOM in the header's default currency.

attributes.name: materialGroup
attributes.description: Name or code of the material group assigned to the item purchased.

attributes.name: orderAmount
attributes.description: Order amount in the functional currency.

attributes.name: orderAmountCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: orderAmountDebitCreditIndicator
attributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

attributes.name: orderAmountLocal
attributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

attributes.name: orderAmountLocalCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: orderAmountReporting
attributes.description: Order amount in the reporting currency.

attributes.name: orderAmountReportingCurrency
attributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

attributes.name: orderDate
attributes.description: The date of the purchase order, regardless of the date the order is entered.

attributes.name: orderDocumentReference
attributes.description: Identification number or code on the purchase order. The date of the purchase order, regardless of the date the order is entered.

attributes.name: orderNo
attributes.description: Internal Purchase Order number.

attributes.name: orderType
attributes.description: Identifier for purchase order Type.

attributes.name: partialInvoiceIndicator
attributes.description: Identifier of where invoice value is only part of PO value - This will enable the user to know how much is invoiced in a PO.

attributes.name: paymentTerms
attributes.description: Payments terms for this invoice.

attributes.name: period
attributes.description: Fiscal period in which the PurchaseOrderDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

attributes.name: periodYear
attributes.description: Fiscal year in which the PurchaseOrderDate occurs.

attributes.name: postingStatus
attributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

attributes.name: purchaseOrderAmountLocal
attributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

attributes.name: purchaseOrderDays
attributes.description: This should identify how old in days is a purchase order.

attributes.name: purchaseOrderLocalCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: purchaseOrderRequisitionId
attributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each purchase order requisition. May require concatenation of multiple fields.

attributes.name: purchaseOrderUniqueId
attributes.description: The unique ID of the purchase order.

attributes.name: purchasingDocumentCategory
attributes.description: Document category associated with purchase, e.g. invoice, bill of sale, etc.

attributes.name: reasonForOrdering
attributes.description: Reason for ordering an item / reason for raising the PO.

attributes.name: receiptNumbers
attributes.description: The number(s) of the receipt(s) on this "consolidated invoice record". Can be a single number, a range or a list.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: selfBillingIndicator
attributes.description: Indicator showing if a self-billing agreement exists between the customer and the supplier.

attributes.name: serviceGroup
attributes.description: Name or code of the service group assigned to the item purchased.

attributes.name: settlementAmount
attributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

attributes.name: settlementAmountLocal
attributes.description: Settlement amount in the local (foreign) currency.

attributes.name: settlementAmountLocalCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: settlementExchangeRate
attributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

attributes.name: settlementPaymentMechanism
attributes.description: Payment mechanism, e.g. cash, cheque or bank transfer.

attributes.name: settlementSettlementDate
attributes.description: The date settled.

attributes.name: settlementSettlementDiscount
attributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount.

attributes.name: shipFromAdditionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipFromAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: shipFromBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: shipFromCity
attributes.description: The physical city in the shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: shipFromCountry
attributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

attributes.name: shipFromDeliveryDate
attributes.description: The date goods are dispatched.

attributes.name: shipFromDeliveryId
attributes.description: Identification of the delivery.

attributes.name: shipFromLocationId
attributes.description: Location of goods in warehouse.

attributes.name: shipFromNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number of the shipping address of the supplier.

attributes.name: shipFromPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the building where the shipping address is located.

attributes.name: shipFromRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the supplier is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: shipFromStreetName
attributes.description: The street from which goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: shipFromUCR
attributes.description: Unique consignment reference number.

attributes.name: shipFromWarehouseId
attributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress or stock-in-transit.

attributes.name: shipToAdditionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the address to which items will be shipped.

attributes.name: shipToAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: shipToBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building shipping to address.

attributes.name: shipToCity
attributes.description: The physical city to which the goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: shipToCountry
attributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

attributes.name: shipToDeliveryDate
attributes.description: The date goods are delivered.

attributes.name: shipToDeliveryId
attributes.description: Identification of the delivery.

attributes.name: shipToLocationId
attributes.description: Location of goods in warehouse.

attributes.name: shipToNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number to which the goods will be shipped.

attributes.name: shipToPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the building where the shipping to address is located.

attributes.name: shipToRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the supplier is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: shipToStreetName
attributes.description: The street to which goods will be delivered.

attributes.name: shipToUCR
attributes.description: Unique consignment reference number.

attributes.name: shipToWarehouseId
attributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress or stock-in-transit.

attributes.name: sourceId
attributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

attributes.name: supplierId
attributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

attributes.name: supplierName
attributes.description: Name of the supplier.

attributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
attributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

attributes.name: systemEntryUser
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

attributes.name: systemId
attributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document.

attributes.name: transactionId
attributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
